title: Weekly Roundup: Thursday, September 15
description: Hillary Clinton is back on the trail. Donald Trump is on 'Dr Oz'. This episode: host/campaign reporter Sam Sanders, campaign reporter Sarah McCammon, political editor Domenico Montanaro, and campaign reporter Asma Khalid. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
